issue.title: [C++] Remove obsolete generated files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13282](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13282). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Files `bpacking_avx2_generated.h` and `bpacking_avx512_generated.h` in `src/arrow/util` are not used anymore, but for some reason we forgot to remove them from the repo.

(my fault, probably)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13282?focusedCommentId=17376917) by Eduardo Ponce (edponce):*
Would this also apply to `packing_simd128_generated.h` and similar files which are generated by <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/util/bpacking_simd_codegen.py>?
I do not think so bc I couldn't find a script that invokes **python bpacking_simd_codegen.py 128 > bpacking_simd128_generated.h**

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13282?focusedCommentId=17377120) by yibocai#1 (yibocai#1):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10682
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10682>
